Packages that use VmPlacementGroup
Package
Description
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.vmplacementgroups
A package with VM allocation policies that support requests with VmPlacementGroups.
org.cloudsimplus.traces.azure
A package with the classes used to run trace-based simulations, e.g., TracesSimulationManager, TracesParser, TracesBatchesManager etc...
